html:
11.7.17  4:30 pm   you mentioned that what happens after life is like what happens to the characters after the movie ends.

     that's not true, i said that in response to a different question

      i've been trying to figure it out but i still don't have an answer. i think i need to bounce it off some friends maybe. can you give me a hint

11.7.17  4:02 pm   Whats your favorite dog breed?

     what's the one where they get to marry for love

11.7.17  3:48 pm   What is your favorite type of boobs

     ghost boobs, (ghoobs)

11.7.17  3:31 pm   Do you know that you know nothing?

     no

11.7.17  3:05 pm   Is it better to not look at the mountains while climbing them so you don't get scared by how much work is left?

     i just don't know anymore

11.7.17  2:39 pm   what's your favorite snack to eat while you create? Pudding? Pizza? Half a calf's brain?

     water

11.7.17  2:14 pm   Do you ever just deadass do a thing

     oh hell yeah

11.7.17  1:49 pm   is new canaan the first live action music video you made with text?

     no

11.7.17  12:43 pm   Were the beatles beetles?

     no

11.7.17  12:12 pm   I don't think i quite understand the concept of tritone substitution. Can you help me out?

     what makes you think it's important

11.7.17  12:00 pm   will you make longer videos

     the longer the video is, the longer it takes to make. for example, the video i'm working on now is longer than my previous one. i'm not sure exactly which length you are looking for

11.7.17  11:09 am   how long are you able to hold a grudge?

     i don't know, i have yet to really push myself in that regard

11.7.17  10:43 am   Why the fuck did you graduate outside in the rain

     i think it's common for graduation ceremonies to be outside. i suppose your next question is why the fuck did it rain, and i am trying to contact a meteorologist right now. i'm on hold, the hold music is purple rain

11.7.17  10:03 am   How do you cope with the fact that human life is an infinitesimal speck in the universe and that any dreams or desires we have are completely insignificant in the grand scheme of things?

     name a grander scheme than ours

11.7.17  9:45 am   What would your commercial be about if you had one? Then what would it say?

     it would just be one of my videos. no watermark, no links, no reference. just the video

11.7.17  9:28 am   What are the rewards that you get after you finish with your work/music/video?

     the sweet likes and favs, and high stakes friendship offers

11.7.17  9:27 am   What are the ways that you would suggest that would keep me from adhering to the current laws of society?

     make new laws

11.7.17  9:26 am   Have you ever spent a day without answering questions here? When was it?

     there was about 3 days last december, but i caught up

11.7.17  9:24 am   I consider you to be the Socrates of our times. Are you OK with it? Do I need to change my point of view? 

      i don't know anything about socrates so i'm not sure

11.7.17  8:42 am   Will you ever consider recording a cover album ?

     cover songs, for sure

11.7.17  5:00 am   what is a question on this page that you are surprised at how frequently it is asked

     this one

11.7.17  2:45 am   Will you ever appear as a reactor in an FBE's  Youtubers React video? I am so longing to watch you in at least a bunch of those episodes.

     i nod slowly, and understandingly, to everything i watch, regardless of what it is

11.7.17  2:42 am   So tell me Bill, would you say this new live action video will shatter everyone's expectations?

     it depends what they are expecting

11.7.17  2:39 am   when will the voices stop?

     oh they're just getting started

11.7.17  2:33 am   how did it feel to graduate high school

     maybe about like this

11.7.17  12:25 am   So recently I drew a picture of a plant being stabbed into a table and bleeding over the edge. It's symbolic for something i've been thinking about lately (#deep, I know). It's pretty wild looking and you'd think it was a hallucination or a fever dream or something meaningless. But it's actually just a metaphor. I could explain it pretty easily... but if I didn't, nobody would ever know what it meant.
Anyway, what I'm saying is: you don't ever really explain why you do what you do in regards to your music,

     yes i do

      and I don't think you ever will.

     i have, and i will continue to do so in the future

      So is it possible for any of us viewers to ever really understand what you make?

     sure

11.6.17  11:25 pm   why is the total amount of money people have pledged to your patreon hidden from view? furthermore, why do i get a deep feeling of committing a terrible social faux pas when i mention specific numbers when discussing my financial situation?

     because money is really powerful stuff

11.6.17  11:12 pm   You seem to be inspiring and, even inadvertently, helping musicians with the music-making process and people with the life-living process all by sharing your story/your life's work on this website. How does this make you feel?

     nice, very good

11.6.17  10:22 pm   please add a favicon. it will make your website so much sexier.

     i disagree but i respect your opinion

11.6.17  9:54 pm   How to deal with the fact that its getting dark earlier and making me depressed?

     it actually doesn't get dark any earlier. but the clock is different. you can beat this by getting up earlier

11.6.17  9:48 pm   i have consumed so much salt over the past few days

     drink a lot of water

11.6.17  9:47 pm   will you answer my question if i don't capitalize any letter?

     whether i answer questions has nothing to do with the capitalization scheme

11.6.17  9:30 pm   does it take longer to make your music or to make your videos?

     video

11.6.17  9:03 pm   i think i'm addicted to water.

     oh, #relatable

11.6.17  8:45 pm   Will the Bill Wurtz Band™ be on your next music video?

     yes

11.6.17  8:26 pm   Have you ever met anybody named luigi?

     no

11.6.17  6:07 pm   woah, found your song "got to know what's going on" and its my new favourite song of all the songs. but unfortunately i listen to music as a playlist i've created on the Youtube, but since "got to know what's going on" isn't on the Youtube, i cant add it to my playlist. now im sad because i cant listen to my new favourite song of all the songs. i cant change to a new way of listening to music though because then i have to sacrifice a lot of the other music i listen to. ahhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhelp.

also semicolons and candles are cool.

     can you email me about this

11.6.17  6:03 pm   what sound does a giraffe make?

     oink?

11.6.17  5:53 pm   do you think the alphabet is stupid and arbitrary

     no

11.6.17  4:51 pm   are u a furry

     no

11.6.17  4:49 pm   What's the worst thing in life?

     death

11.6.17  4:48 pm   How does one validate their existence?

     you can do it at the town hall

11.6.17  4:17 pm   What if I invent a word just right now?

     that is fine with me

     Such as blyfout? Do you like it?

     it's ok

     It's a verb. Are you going to blyfout tomorrow?

     i don't know what it means

     But what is the meaning of this word?

     i don't know

     Should I continue to waste my time like this or I should blyfout?

     i don't know

     The life is full of existential questions.

     that's true

11.6.17  3:59 pm   Have you ever set up a Tinder profile?

     no

11.6.17  3:53 pm   do you consider yourself a folk musician

     i will let you figure that out, while i focus on making the music

11.6.17  3:40 pm   I don't know how to write

     make up a way!

11.6.17  2:52 pm   is my favorite james taylor album one man dog, or is it gorilla? i can't decide.

     it is the original flying machine

11.6.17  2:46 pm   moonlanding was probably fake

     that's because the moon is fake

11.6.17  12:08 pm   10.25.17  9:42 pm I remember the answer to this question used to have a really long tangent about how patreon should remove the "is creating" part, but you removed it. Why did you remove it?

     i was asking everyone to tweet at them and politely request it, but then i talked to the CEO again he very politely told me a 5th time that it's never going to fucking happen

11.6.17  11:12 am   were you bad at obeying authority?

     when
